ai-cp27:2.1_0: Since I can stand on the earth
ai-cp27:2.2_0: I descend from the near shore,
ai-cp27:3.2_0: ‘I’m the one who says,’ that he says.
ai-cp27:4.1_0: there is no way of speaking,
ai-cp27:4.2_0: just as I had been told.
ai-cp27:4.3_0: there is no equal for me.
ai-cp27:4.5_0: like the seventh sun at Kapilavatthu.
